Detailed Description

template<class Type>
class stHugeGenericMatrix< Type >

This class template implements is a variant of stGenericMatrix which is able to store a very large matrix.

Author:
Fabio Jun Takada Chino (chino@icmc.usp.br)

Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvieira@icmc.usp.br)

Version:
1.0

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<class Type>
stHugeGenericMatrix< Type >::stHugeGenericMatrix (   )  [inline]
 

Creates a new Matrix with 0 cols and 0 rows. Use SetSize() to change the size of this matrix.
